1. City Commission

City Commission
===============

![Mayor and Commissioners standing for a professional photo in front of the City logo.](https://www.canyontx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=5405)

The City of Canyon City Commission consists of 5 members elected at large. Â Commissioners can be contacted by email or by calling 806-655-5000 ext. 223.

Mayor Place 1 - Gary Hinders
[ghinders@canyontx.com](mailto:ghinders@canyontx.com)

Mayor Pro-Tem Place 2 - Cody Jones
[cjones@canyontx.com](mailto:cjones@canyontx.com)

Commissioner Place 3 - Paul R. Lyons
[plyons@canyontx.com](mailto:plyons@canyontx.com)

Commissioner Place 4 - Robyn Cranmer
[rcranmer@canyontx.com](mailto:rcranmer@canyontx.com)

Commissioner Place 5 - Danny J. Potter
[dpotter@canyontx.com](mailto:dpotter@canyontx.com)

* First and Third Tuesday of each month
* City Hall, 301 16th St.

Agendas, Minutes and
[Legal Notices](https://www.canyontx.gov/DocumentCenterii.aspx?FID=25)
are available for viewing.
[Agendas](https://www.canyontx.gov/AgendaCenter/City-of-Canyon-Commission-Meetings-2 "agendas and minutes")
will be posted 72 hours before the scheduled City of Canyon Commission meetings.
[Minutes](https://www.canyontx.gov/AgendaCenter/City-of-Canyon-Commission-Meetings-2)
will be posted once approved by the City Commission.
[Archives of Agendas and Minutes](https://www.canyontx.gov/AgendaCenter/City-of-Canyon-Commission-Meetings-2 "agendas and minutes")
and
[Legal or Public Notices](https://www.canyontx.gov/DocumentCenterii.aspx?FID=25)
are maintained in the document center for 2 years.
